author: npaquoc87
title: Cardano Incredible Race - 2022
description: Cardano Community in Vietnam is lacking of social events. We need to make Cardano community more visible and create impact to new people.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is to create a Cardano community with running enthusiasts in Vietnam, running is a sport that requires no skills, anyone can participate, so the community is very large. The Vietnamese Cardano community also has many running enthusiasts; these people often work alone, there is no playground to connect them together. After this proposal is completed, this will be a playground to help connect old members of the Vietnam Cardano community, when this playground works effectively, there will be impacts for newcomers to join, learn about the Cardano blockchain.
f6_assessments.q1: This proposal, if funded, will have the first activity be a virtual running event through the Uprace.org running application, this application has organized many successful virtual running events and has a user community in Vietnam, Creating and organizing virtual running events is a simple task for internet users. The hardest job of this event was how to organize and promote to attract members to participate; the proponent also provided solutions, detailed plans and time to promote and attract members. The members of the proposed team are people with experience in community management, communication and social marketing, so they are fully capable of implementing this proposal successfully. However, this is a virtual running event, there will be risks such as participants cheating in the event, the problem of running application ... currently the proponent does not have a specific solution, they have to depend on the solution from Uprace.
f6_assessments.q2: The proponent has experience in management and organization, so this proposal has a very detailed plan with division of tasks and Kpi for each specific timeline. The budget table is also well allocated for each category such as organization funds, prizes, NFT minting stored on the Cardano blockchain. However, to assess whether this proposal is completely successful or not, there is only one way to wait for the official report from the proponent after completion.

f6_assessments.q0: Recently, community events often took place online partly due to the Covid-19 epidemic, the community was not allowed to go out or gather in large numbers. Currently, the global epidemic situation has been partially controlled. Countries are getting ready for the new normal. The organization of Cardano Incredible Race is a very interesting idea that can help the community relieve stress after tiring working hours, thereby also contributing to connecting the Cardano community in general and the community of sports enthusiasts. in particular closer together. This event will help more people know about the Cardano community, thereby more people will join the Cardano community. In addition, running to raise funds for afforestation is a very meaningful thing to do in the context of increasing impacts of climate change on the environment. This will also give the international community a much better view of what the Cardano community has achieved.

f6_assessments.q0:
Running is one of the most popular and easy-to-practice sports in the world, especially during the covid-19 pandemic, more and more people are running to improve their physical and mental health. Meanwhile, the Cardano community in Vietnam is lacking in social events to engage and attract new participants. Thus the proposal gave the idea of creating the Cardano Runners Community Hub in Vietnam and then to the Cardano community globally. The first activity will be a virtual running event through the Uprace application (a famous running application in Vietnam: https://uprace.org/).
The proposed team will raise funds to organize a global virtual running event called “Cardano Incredible Race 2022” within 3 weeks. The event documents will list Sponsors (Cardano projects, Pool Operator) as diamond, gold, silver sponsors, thereby impacting the local community (estimated at at least 10,000 runners excluding social reach).
Holding such an event solves the Key Metrics of the challenge: Increasing the number of local community centers, new developers to the Cardano ecosystem, promoting Cardano and attracting more new users of Cardano; The Cardano Uprace 2022 is also the initial marketing launch for Cardano Runners Community Group in Vietnam and it will reach the Cardano community and new users who are interested in running and jogging.
The project also donates to plant trees for Cardano Forest in Vietnam or other Tree Planting Projects/organizations in Vietnam thus reaching outside organizations as well as government agencies.
For the above reasons, this proposal is a really great proposal.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal has a very clear and specific roadmap, starting from the date of receipt of money from the fund to 20/9/2022, each stage has clear work to be performed: in the first 10 days, create marketing/ communication documents, next 20 days working with Uprace team to create event on Uprace App and anti-fraud/scale solution, 2 months later doing media, marketing, completing t-shirt design and celebration Medals, online certificate design, 3 weeks event time from 9/7/2022 to 30/7/2022…The organization of the event is also very detailed and easy to understand: registration time, registration method, event time, participation method, result recognition method, and rewards… Therefore, the above project can be completed successfully.
The team applied for a budget for this proposal of $24,870, which includes social media costs of $5,120 (with details of costs such as posting, marketing, design, etc.), t-shirt and medal costs $10,000, Certificate of NFT minted on Cardano $2,500, donation to plant trees for Cardano Forest in Vietnam Other tree planting projects/organizations in Vietnam with Certificate of “Cardano Runners Community” $2,000, project management costs $1,800... These costs are reasonable and should not exceed 5% of the total challenge budget.
The project implementation staff consists of 2 people, both very active people who are passionate about running and have both knowledge of cardano and experience in social marketing and running tournaments, so the project can be successful.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal gave criteria to measure the results of the project: number of participants (10,000 people), number of new wallets created (2,000 wallets), number of teams formed (50 teams), how much it raised ($15,000), Cardano Runners Community Hub's facebook has 10,000 members. The numbers above are indeed a great result and easily controllable by the community.
f6_assessments.reply: Thank you for your feedback, you did very good job in sumarising the proposal that will benefit for busy voters. Appreciate it!

Regarding the scaling of this proposal in future challenges, there are many ways to achieve it.
